name: jeasteregg
author: Martin Krause
description: Type the right key sequence right upon entering to unlock the hidden treasue. The plugin will start watching upon the first keypress - don't hesitate. Features: multiple easterEggs on one page: hide easter eggs on specific element; use your own key sequence: with the konami code as the default; listen to jQuery.easterEgg or override the complete callback with your own function; memory friendly: removes all events / data afterwards
